mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM, REVIEW_NO, RESTAURANT_NO, MEMBER_NO, PARENT_REVIEW_NO, NICKNAME, CONTENTS, PAR_REVIEW_NO, PAR_NICKNAME, PAR_CONTENTS, CRE_DATE, MOD_DATE FROM (SELECT C2.REVIEW_NO, C2.RESTAURANT_NO, C2.MEMBER_NO, C2.PARENT_REVIEW_NO, M2.NICKNAME, C2.CONTENTS, R.REVIEW_NO AS PAR_REVIEW_NO, R.NICKNAME AS PAR_NICKNAME, R.CONTENTS AS PAR_CONTENTS, C2.CRE_DATE, C2.MOD_DATE FROM ( SELECT C.REVIEW_NO AS REVIEW_NO, M.NICKNAME AS NICKNAME, C.RESTAURANT_NO AS RESTAURANT_NO , C.CONTENTS AS CONTENTS FROM REVIEW C, RESTAURANTS B, MEMBERS M WHERE C.RESTAURANT_NO = B.RESTAURANT_NO AND M.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO ORDER BY C.REVIEW_NO DESC )R RIGHT JOIN REVIEW C2 ON R.REVIEW_NO = C2.PARENT_REVIEW_NO JOIN MEMBERS M2 ON C2.MEMBER_NO = M2.MEMBER_NO WHERE C2.RESTAURANT_NO = #{restaurantNo} ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC)

mapper.select: SELECT C.REVIEW_NO, C.RESTAURANT_NO, C.CONTENTS, C.MEMBER_NO, M.NICKNAME, C.CRE_DATE, C.MOD_DATE FROM REVIEW C, RESTAURANTS B, MEMBERS M WHERE C.RESTAURANT_NO = B.RESTAURANT_NO AND C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND C.REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo};
